alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Claiborne; Grant; Jackson; Lincoln; Natchitoches; Red River; Sabine; Webster; Winn (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 1:18AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Grant, southern Webster, western Jackson, eastern Red River, Natchitoches, southern Claiborne, Bienville, southeastern Sabine, western Lincoln and western Winn Parishes through 215 AM CDT... At 117 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Dixie Inn to near Ringgold to 10 miles southwest of Natchitoches to near Hornbeck. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ruston, Natchitoches, Minden, Grambling, Winnfield, Jonesboro, Homer, Arcadia, Coushatta, Ringgold, Sibley, Campti, Gibsland, Doyline, Montgomery, Dixie Inn, Dubberly, Heflin, Allen and Simsboro. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Bienville; Claiborne; Grant; Jackson; Lincoln; Natchitoches; Red River; Sabine; Webster; Winn
